Effect (JP): クリティカル率が12%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 12%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 12%.

Effect (JP): PPの自然回復速度が17%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 17%.
Effect (Global): Increases Natural PP recovery by 17%.

Effect (JP): PPの自然回復速度が20%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 20%.
Effect (Global): Increases Natural PP recovery by 20%.

Effect (JP): 攻撃時のPP回復量が20%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 20%.
Effect (Global): Increases active PP recovery by 20%.

Effect (JP): 攻撃時のPP回復量が23%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 23%.
Effect (Global): Increases active PP recovery by 23%.

Effect (JP): 攻撃時のPP回復量が35%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 35%.
Effect (Global): Increases active PP recovery by 35%.

Effect (JP): 一定時間ごとにHPを40%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 40% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 40% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.

Effect (JP): 一定時間ごとにHPを60%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 60% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 60% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.

Effect (JP): 4秒ごとにPPを7回復する。
Effect (English): Restores 7 PP every 4 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 7 PP every 4 seconds.

Effect (JP): 被ダメージを7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces damage taken by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces damage taken by 7%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル時の与ダメージが4%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit damage by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage by 4%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル時の与ダメージが5%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit damage by 5%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage by 5%.

Effect (JP): 強敵への与ダメージが4%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage dealt to bosses by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage dealt to bosses by 4%.

Effect (JP): 破壊可能な部位を攻撃した際、威力が4%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage against breakable parts by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage against breakable parts by 4%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが2%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 2%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 2%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.

Effect (JP): 一定の範囲内でエネミーが死亡した時、PPが回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 3 PP when an enemy near you is defeated.
Effect (Global): Recovers 3 PP when a nearby enemy is defeated.

Effect (JP): ダメージを受けた際にPPを15%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 15% of your max PP when you take damage.
Effect (Global): Recovers 15% of your max PP when you take damage.

Effect (JP): 別のPAやテクニックをジャストアタックすると与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Just Attacks.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% when consecutively chaining different PAs or Techniques with Perfect Attacks.

Effect (JP): HPが80%以上の時、与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% while HP is above 80%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% while HP is above 80%.

Effect (JP): HPが80%以上の時、与ダメージが5%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 5% while HP is above 80%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 5% while HP is above 80%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、攻撃時PP回復量が28%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 28% when S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, Active PP recovery is increased by 28%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、被ダメージを10%軽減。
Effect (English): Decreases damage taken by 10% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, damage taken is reduced by 10%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、PP自然回復量23%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 23% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, natural PP recovery is increased by 23%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、PP自然回復量25%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 25% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, natural PP recovery is increased by 25%.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、毎秒威力が上昇。最大で5%。
Effect (English): Increases damage over time while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active. Maxes out at 5% after 37.5 seconds.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, damage increases every second. Maxes out at 5% after 37.5 seconds.

Effect (JP): 花ノ赤閃・海ノ青閃・雪ノ白閃が発動中、毎秒威力が上昇。最大で7%。
Effect (English): Increases damage over time while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, or S1:White Snow Flash are active. Maxes out at 7% after 37.5 seconds.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, or Snowgleam are active, damage increases every second. Maxes out at 7% after 37.5 seconds.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、毎秒HPが2%回復。
Effect (English): Recovers 2% of max HP every second while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, recover 2% of max HP every second.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, damage is increased by 3%.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、PP消費量を14%軽減。
Effect (English): Decreases PP consumption by 12% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, PP consumption is reduced by 14%.

Effect (JP): 月ノ黄閃・葉ノ緑閃・影ノ黒閃が発動中、クリティカル率20%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 20% while S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, Critical Hit Rate is increased by 20%.

Effect (JP): 花・海・葉・月・雪・影のいずれかが発動中PP消費量を20%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 20% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash, S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, Snowgleam, Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, PP consumption is reduced by 20%.

Effect (JP): 花・海・葉・月・雪・影のいずれかが発動中攻撃時PP回復量が45%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 45% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash, S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, Snowgleam, Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, active PP recovery is increased by 45%.

Effect (JP): 花・海・葉・月・雪・影のいずれかが発動中PP自然回復量40%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 40% while S1:Red Petal Flash, S1:Blue Ocean Flash, S1:White Snow Flash, S1:Yellow Moon Flash, S1:Green Leaf Flash, or S1:Black Shadow Flash are active.
Effect (Global): While Petalgleam, Seagleam, Snowgleam, Moongleam, Leafgleam, or Shadowgleam are active, natural PP recovery is increased by 40%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.

Effect (JP): 威力とクリティカル率が上昇。PP効率が向上。被ダメージで消失。一定時間で効果が復活。
Effect (English):
Increases damage by 4% and Critical Hit Rate by 5%.
Enhances PP efficiency as follows:
PP recovery +10%
Active PP recovery +15%
PP consumption -5%.
Effects will be lost when damage is taken (180s cooldown).
Effect (Global):
Increases damage by 4% and Critical Hit Rate by 5%.
Enhances PP efficiency as follows:
PP recovery +10%
Active PP recovery +15%
PP consumption -5%.
Effects will be lost when damage is taken (180s cooldown).

Effect (JP): フォトンブラストゲージに応じてPP消費量が減少する。
Effect (English):
Reduces PP consumption based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 4%
4~7 bars: 8%
Full charge: 12%
Effect (Global):
Reduces PP consumption based on the Photon Blast Gauge.
0~3 bars: 4%
4~7 bars: 8%
Full charge: 12%

Effect (JP): 通常攻撃が命中した時HPが70回復。発動後リキャスト発生。
Effect (English): Recovers 70 HP when you hit an enemy with a Normal Attack. Has a 1.2~1.3s cooldown between uses.
Effect (Global): Recovers 70 HP when you hit an enemy with a Normal Attack. Has a 1.2~1.3s cooldown between uses.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージ300000ごとに被ダメージが1%軽減。（最大15%まで）
Effect (English): Reduces damage taken by 1% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.
Effect (Global): Reduces damage taken by 1% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージ300000ごとにPP消費量が1%軽減。（最大15%まで）
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 1% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 1% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 15%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージ300000ごとにクリティカル率が2%上昇。（最大30%まで）
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 2% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 30%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 2% for every 300,000 damage dealt. Maxes at 30%.

Effect (JP): 一定間隔で自身にシフタを発動する。
Effect (English): Casts Shifta on yourself every 14 seconds. Uses your currently learned level of Shifta.
Effect (Global): Shifta is automatically cast every 14 seconds. Uses your currently learned level of Shifta.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが4%上昇し、抜刀時のみ被ダメージが8%増える。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 4% but take 8% more damage when weapon is drawn.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 4% but take 8% more damage while your weapon is drawn.

Effect (JP): JA攻撃が命中する度PP回復性能が3%上昇。最大で45%まで上昇。JA失敗時に消失しない。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 4% but take 8% more damage when weapon is drawn.

Effect (JP): 破壊可能部位への攻撃でクリティカル発動時に威力が9%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit damage against breakable parts by 9%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage against breakable parts by 9%.

Effect (English): Increases the damage of non-Critical Hits by 5%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage against breakable parts by 9%.

Effect (English): Increases power by 5% and reduce damage taken by 12% in the Quest "Solo Training: Phanatical Phantoms."
